Package fun.connor.lighter.handler

APIs for handling HTTP requests.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LighterRequestResolver
    Functional interface for resolving HTTP requests.
    Request
    An HTTP request.
    RequestGuard
    Marker interface that identifies a type as a Request Guard.
    RequestGuardFactory<T extends RequestGuard>
    Factory for constructing RequestGuard instances from HTTP requests.
    ResourceControllerMetaData
    Runtime available metadata generated for ResourceController annotated classes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TypeMarshalException
    Type marshalling exception.

Package fun.connor.lighter.handler Description

APIs for handling HTTP requests. This includes the interfaces for directly handling requests, reading metadata about the applications request handling configuration, and request guards
